Model
 

  • Uses of Card in Model

    Classes in Model that implement Card
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    DealCard
    Implements the Card Interface and it contains all the data needed for a DealCard and the methods to access and transform the data
    class 
    MessageCard
    Implements the Card Interface and it contains all the data needed for a MessageCard and the methods to access and transform the data
    Methods in Model that return Card
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Card
    CardDeck.getTopCard()
    Transformer: removes the last element and returns it
    Precondition: The deck is not empty
    Postcondirion: The card is removed from the deck and is returned
    Methods in Model that return types with arguments of type Card
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ArrayList<Card>
    Player.getCardInventory()
    accessor: Returns the card inventory of the player
    Postcondition: returns the card inventory of the player
    Methods in Model with parameters of type Card
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    Player.addCard​(Card card)
    transformer: adds a card to the inventory of the player
    precondition: the card is not null
    postcondition: the card has been added
    void
    CardDeck.addCardToBottom​(Card card)
    Transformer: adds a Card as the first element
    Precondition: The deck has not reached maxCapacity
    Postcondirion: The card is added as the first element of the deck
    Constructor parameters in Model with type arguments of type Card
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    CardDeck​(ArrayList<Card> deck, DeckType type)
    Constructor: Constructs a new CardDeck and sets the type of the card deck.
